items.name: The Rendezvous
items.desc:
6.8% Idaho 7 & Bru-1 NEIPA 440ml CanWe went with some of our favourite new hops, Bru-1 & Idaho 7, along with London Fog, our preferred yeast for New England styles. The result takes our usual hazy pales and turns the volume up. Play it loud.
The label art, designed by Sienna, is inspired by The Memphis group. Keeping it simple and a little bit fun all at the same time - we contain multitudes!

items.name: Tomorrow's World
items.desc:
New England Pale 5.5% 440ml CAN
Assemble your finest hops and let's hit the road. We're heading to the future, baby! Don't need no ticket for this journey...Where we're going there are no roads....It's a brave new world out there! Better buckle up!

3...2...1...BLAST OFF!
Mosaic, Citra, Simcoe, Amarillo + London Ale 3 softhazytropicaldelicious

items.name: It Is Wednesday My Dudes
items.desc:
5.2% Special Lager

A Vienna style lager brings fresh and floral hops together with a blend of toasty German malts. Crisp & refreshing but with a rich and complex flavour, perfect for a summertime BBQ.

items.name: Behind Door Number 3
items.desc:
8.5% Mosaic & Citra New England DIPA 440ml Can
Behind Door Number 3 is the culmination of lots of experimentation pushing fruity and juicy hops to the maximum. Big hitter hops + London Fog yeast = a beer worth waiting all year for.

items.name: Golden State
items.desc:
Amarillo Cryo & BBC New England Pale 5.2% 440ml Can

Amarillo is one of our favourite hops, it's bright and full of citrusy joy. We regularly use it as a supporting player in our beers, but for Golden State we really let it shine and take centre stage. We've dry-hopped with both BBC & Cryo Amarillo & added a hint of orange zest in the whirlpool to round out this juicy New England Pale.

 

Shipping is £5.99 per box Each box can hold up to 15 beersMinimum order is 8 cans (can be made up of different beers)

items.name: Perfect Life
items.desc:
Amarillo, Ekuanot & Meridian New England Pale 4.6%
 
Dreaming of the park, longing for that holiday, craving a beer with pals in person… We’re all just wishing for the perfect life. Unfortunately we can't make any promises, beyond this lightly balanced little pale ale. Sherbetty fruits, a touch of bitterness, and a hint of dank.
Springtime juice for enjoying with good times.

items.name: Pale Fire
items.desc:
4.8% Amarillo & Mosaic Pale Ale  440ml Can

Pale Fire.We’ve come a long long way together.If there is one beer that we think of when our minds drift to what Pressure Drop means, it is Pale Fire. Brewed every week since our earliest days, it is our shining, hazy gold, North Star of a beer.Pale Fire is the definition of the Pressure Drop mantra - “We brew what we would like to drink”. Sessionable, with tropical aromas from the Mosaic and Amarillo hops, it is a juicy pale with a balanced bitter finish.When we first began experimenting with canning here at Pressure Drop, the end goal was always going to be Pale Fire in cans. Spending time with pals, opening a six pack of fresh and crisp Pale Fire, enjoying its easy drinking ways. That has been the dream, now it is the reality.Find your nearest sun drenched swimming pool, hike in the gentle shade of a pine forest, or, failing that, sit in the hazy summer heat of a city park. Crack open a can, and let the world become a better place.Label Artwork by our Graham O'Brien 

SHIPPING £5.99 per box Boxes hold up to 15 cans Our minimum order is 12 cans (these can be a mix of different beers)

items.name: Great Heights
items.desc:
4.8% Unfiltered PilsnerA brewer’s life is a busy one. It’s not always easy to get a break. However, sometimes a break can result in some great brewing.
Great Heights is a pilsner that is lagered in tank for six weeks, to achieve maximum crispy freshness. Mittelfruh & Perle hops for a classic light bitterness, Great Heights is an uncomplicated delight. A great pilsner is a true and simple joy, and aren’t those the best kind of joys you can have?
The dreamy artwork on this label is by Tottenham based artist Natsko Seki

items.name: Future Sunshine
items.desc:
6.5 % Peach, Pineapple & Passionfruit Sour 440ml CAN(contains lactose- not suitable for vegans)
How much fruit can you jam in one beer? A whole heckin' lot it turns out!
 Future Sunshine tastes just like it you'd imagine, sweet and sour with a creamy body (thank you lactose).Cheer up juice in a can. 
 
SHIPPING £5.99 per box Boxes hold up to 15 cans Our minimum order is 8 cans (these can be a mix of different beers)
